tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Artifact_Provenance
(
 artifact_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
 artifact_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
 provenance VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
 provenance_date DATE,
 current_location VARCHAR(255),
 authenticity BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE Transactions (
    transaction_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    artifact_id INT NOT NULL,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    transaction_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    transaction_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE artifact_history (
  event_id UUID NOT NULL,
  artifact_id UUID NOT NULL,
  event_description STRING,
  event_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (event_id)
);

CREATE TABLE artifact (
  artifact_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  artifact_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  artifact_description TEXT,
  acquisition_date DATE,
  provenance VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE artifact_location (
  location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  location_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE artifact_owner (
  owner_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  owner_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  contact_information VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE artifact_transaction (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  artifact_id INT NOT NULL,
  transaction_date DATE,
  transaction_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  seller_id INT,
  buyer_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE Artifacts (
 artifact_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 artifact_name VARCHAR(255),
 provenance VARCHAR(255),
 value DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE ArtifactsOwners (
 owner_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 owner_name VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE ArtifactsLocation (
 location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 location_name VARCHAR(255),
 security_level INT
)

CREATE TABLE ArtifactsTransactions (
 transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 transaction_date DATE,
 artifact_id INT,
 buyer_id INT,
 seller_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE ArtifactsAuditTrail (
 audit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 artifact_id INT,
 action VARCHAR(255),
 timestamp TIMESTAMP
)
